rules_text:
When Ross Wells, Abductee enters the battlefield, create a Sighting token. [i](It’s a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast a Strange spell, exile Ross Wells. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
